body_content.explanation: someone who works in orthotics (= the use of devices such as braces and splints to support weak or damaged bones, joints, muscles, etc.):
examples: An orthotist makes and fits braces and splints for patients who need added support for body parts that have been weakened by injury or disease.
Nutritionists, physiotherapists and orthotists play an important role in regaining trouble free walking.
